body:
Hey guys,

I wanted to make a thread concerning your best monument streak :O

This means the amount of monuments that you destroyed map to map without anyone else getting the monuments and without you losing.

Dying is not a factor.

Mine (since when I came back to Avicus) is 7 monuments I believe.

replies.body: Keep in mind, when I mean streak, I mean map by map without someone else on your team getting any monuments either. So basically a map winning streak, by the amount of monuments. Cause if it was just the monuments in a row, I would probably have 20-30 in a row.
